bibl.title: Mucianus and a Touch of the Miraculous: Pilgrimage and Tourism in Roman Asia Minor.
Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods
bibl.author: WILLIAMSON, George

bibl.note: See pp. 240-245: Herodotus' Eyes. Various fragments from Mucianus' work have a strong Herodotean flavour (e.g. the description of Lake Moeris).
WILLIAMSON George, Mucianus and a Touch of the Miraculous: Pilgrimage and Tourism in Roman Asia Minor.
Jas ELSNER and Ian RUTHERFORD (Edd.), Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods (Oxford, 2005) pp. 219-252.
